indications:
Indications herpes simplex and herpes
zoster infection but of little value
name: IDOXURIDINE IN DIMETHYL SULFOXIDE
cautions: Cautions avoid contact with the eyes, mucous membranes, and textiles; interactions: Appendix 1 (dimethyl sulfoxide)
side-effects:
Side-effects stinging on application, changes in taste; overuse
may cause maceration
doses:
apply to lesions 4 times daily for 4 days, starting at
first sign of attack; child under 12
years, not recommended
pregnancy:
Pregnancy teratogenic in animal studies—manufacturer
advises avoid
